text: Ken Judge (15 January 1958 - 15 January 2016) was an Australian rules footballer and coach. He played for East Fremantle, Hawthorn and the Brisbane Bears during the 1970s and 1980s. He also coached Hawthorn from 1996 to 1999 and the West Coast Eagles from 2000 to 2001. Judge died from multiple myeloma on his 58th birthday in Perth, Western Australia. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Australian rules football coaches Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma
title: Ken Judge
